build.script:
compilerPath='/Users/Dan/Developer/PlaydateSDK/bin/pdc'
simulatorPath='/Users/Dan/Developer/PlaydateSDK/bin/PlaydateSimulator.app/Contents/MacOS/PlaydateSimulator'
sourcePath='./source'
outputPath='./builds/MissleCrank.pdx'
